this_title: A Tale of Five Temples - The Story of Hinduism in Britain
introduction: A Tale of Five Temples - The Story of Hinduism in BritainDocumentary exploring the history of five Hindu temples across Britain, tracing their stories and the spread of Hinduism in the UK. Featuring the elaborate rituals and the moving stories of Hindu worshippers, the film gives an insight into the sheer variety of Hindu beliefs across Britain. A story of protest and love, beauty and hope.
chinese_title: A Tale of Five Temples - The Story of Hinduism in Britain
